verses.verse: To the chief Musician, <WH5329> A Psalm of David <WH1732> the servant <WH5650> of the LORD. <WH3068> The transgression <WH6588> of the wicked <WH7563> saith <WH5002> within <WH7130> my heart, <WH3820> that there is no <WH369> fear <WH6343> of God <WH430> before <WH5048> his eyes. <WH5869>
For <WH3588> he flattereth <WH2505> <WH413> himself in his own eyes, <WH5869> until his iniquity <WH5771> be found <WH4672> to be hateful. <WH8130>
The words <WH1697> of his mouth <WH6310> are iniquity <WH205> and deceit: <WH4820> he hath left off <WH2308> to be wise, <WH7919> and to do good. <WH3190>

He deviseth <WH2803> mischief <WH205> upon <WH5921> his bed; <WH4904> he setteth himself <WH3320> in <WH5921> a way <WH1870> that is not <WH3808> good; <WH2896> he abhorreth <WH3988> not <WH3808> evil. <WH7451>
Thy mercy, <WH2617> O LORD, <WH3068> is in the heavens; <WH8064> and thy faithfulness <WH530> reacheth unto <WH5704> the clouds. <WH7834>

Thy righteousness <WH6666> is like the great <WH410> mountains; <WH2042> thy judgments <WH4941> are a great <WH7227> deep: <WH8415> O LORD, <WH3068> thou preservest <WH3467> man <WH120> and beast. <WH929>
How <WH4100> excellent <WH3368> is thy lovingkindness, <WH2617> O God! <WH430> therefore the children <WH1121> of men <WH120> put their trust <WH2620> under the shadow <WH6738> of thy wings. <WH3671>
They shall be abundantly satisfied <WH7301> with the fatness <WH4480> <WH1880> of thy house; <WH1004> and thou shalt make them drink <WH8248> of the river <WH5158> of thy pleasures. <WH5730>
For <WH3588> with <WH5973> thee is the fountain <WH4726> of life: <WH2416> in thy light <WH216> shall we see <WH7200> light. <WH216>
O continue <WH4900> thy lovingkindness <WH2617> unto them that know <WH3045> thee; and thy righteousness <WH6666> to the upright <WH3477> in heart. <WH3820>
Let not <WH408> the foot <WH7272> of pride <WH1346> come against <WH935> me, and let not <WH408> the hand <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7563> remove <WH5110> me.
There <WH8033> are the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205> fallen: <WH5307> they are cast down, <WH1760> and shall not <WH3808> be able <WH3201> to rise. <WH6965>
